scripts.build: sass style/css: && pug index.pug privacy-policy.pug cookies-policy.pug -P
scripts.build:min: sass style/css: --style compressed && pug index.pug privacy-policy.pug cookies-policy.pug && html-minifier index.html -o index.html --collapseBooleanAttributes --removeComments --preserveLineBreaks --minify-css true --minify-js true --maxLineLength 100
